name: companies_balance_sheet_statements
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool financial_modeling_prep.
Tool description: Extensive Financial Data API covering more than 70,000 Stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds and indexes! Real-time & Historical Data
API description: Fetches the balance sheet statements of a company using the given symbol.

symbol.description: The symbol name of the company for which the balance sheet statements are to be fetched.

apikey.description: The API key required for accessing the Financial Modeling Prep service.
